meanings.definition: A small cart drawn by a dog.
meanings.sent1: The dogcart was filled with fresh vegetables from the farm.
meanings.sent2: The children giggled as they rode in the dogcart pulled by their furry friend.
meanings.sent3: The dog seemed quite proud as it pulled the dogcart around the yard.
meanings.sent4: The dogcart glided through the park, a loyal companion leading the way.
meanings.sent5: The colorful dogcart stood out among the other carts in the market.

meanings.definition: A cart used for transporting goods or people, pulled by a dog.
meanings.sent1: The dogcart carried sacks of flour to the bakery every morning.
meanings.sent2: The dog happily pulled the dogcart filled with picnic supplies.
meanings.sent3: The dogcart made grocery shopping a fun adventure for the whole family.
meanings.sent4: The dogcart trundled along the path, a faithful companion in tow.
meanings.sent5: The sturdy dogcart was essential for transporting heavy loads across town.

meanings.definition: A type of horse-drawn carriage with two wheels.
meanings.sent1: The elegant dogcart was used for leisurely rides in the countryside.
meanings.sent2: The horse trotted gracefully while pulling the dogcart behind.
meanings.sent3: The dog looked confused when asked to pull the horse-drawn dogcart.
meanings.sent4: The dogcart rolled along the cobblestone streets, a symbol of a bygone era.
meanings.sent5: The ornate dogcart was a sight to behold during the town parade.
